# **Hello there, Welcome!**

I am a Senior Research Associate in the *Oceanography Group* at **Atmospheric & Environmental Research Inc.**

I recently completed my Ph.D. at **Department of Earth & Environment** at **Boston University**.\
\
Where I investigated **large-scale ocean atmosphere interactions associated with Kuroshio Extension variations and their linkages with marine heatwaves**, advised by [**Prof. Bruce Anderson**](https://www.bu.edu/earth/profiles/bruce-anderson/).\

### **Recent Highlights**

**Summer 24'**

Check out our [**newly published article**](https://rdcu.be/dSJH7) in ***Climate Dynamics***.

**Spring 24'**

[Defended my Doctoral Dissertation](https://www.bu.edu/earth/2024/03/29/congratulations-to-dr-nishchitha-etige-on-your-successfully-completing-your-ph-d-defense/) titled ***"Influence of the Kuroshio Extension on the Pacific Decadal Precession and Marine Environment in the Northeast Pacific"*** on March 28th, 2024

**Fall 23'**

Joined [**AER Inc.**](aer.com) as a **Senior Research Associate** in the Oceanography Group.

Check out our [**newly published article**](https://www.nature.com/articles/s43247-023-01010-1) in ***Communications Earth & Environment***.
